sentences.en: All the offices are rather austere and small, even the President's.
sentences.cn: 所有的办公室, 甚至包括总统办公室在内,都是相当简朴而窄小的.

sentences.en: Grandfather was an austere man, very strict with his children.
sentences.cn: 祖父是个严厉的人, 对子女要求非常严格.

sentences.en: He is austere and grave in deportment.
He was a little thinner, a little whiter, a little more austere.
sentences.cn: 他稍微瘦了些 、 脸色白了些, 也更严肃了些.

sentences.en: her austere bedroom with its simple narrow bed
sentences.cn: 她那仅有一张窄床的简陋卧室

sentences.en: Her father is a very austere man.
His way of life is rather austere.
sentences.cn: 他的生活方式相当简朴.

sentences.en: I found her a rather austere, distant, somewhat cold person.
sentences.cn: 我发现她相当严厉，拒人于千里之外，近乎冷漠。

sentences.en: In her own home, she replaced austere minimalism with cosy warmth and colour.
sentences.cn: 她一改朴素简约的装饰风格，将自己家里布置得温暖舒适，色彩温馨。

sentences.en: It was true, my room has cast its austere winter garments.
sentences.cn: 的确, 我的房间已经换掉了它朴素的冬装.

sentences.en: The church was austere and simple.
The life of the troops was still comparatively austere.
sentences.cn: 军队的生活还是相对清苦的。

sentences.en: The motive behind such words is austere rather than snobbish.
sentences.cn: 使用这些字样的动机是庄严肃穆而非趋炎附势.

sentences.en: The trees were bare by then - everything very austere - but somehow strengthening.
sentences.cn: 那时树木光秃秃的 -- 一切都很冷峭肃杀 -- 但不知为什么,却使人坚强.

sentences.en: We led an austere life in the mountain.
sentences.cn: 我们在山里过着十分简朴的的生活.

trans.tran_cn: 朴素的，简朴的，严峻的，严厉的，苦行的，一丝不苟的
trans.tran_en: plain and simple and without any decoration
